revised_title: Spectroscopic Analysis of Selenium Molecule's B-X Band System
tldr: The authors conducted a detailed rotational analysis of the B-X band system of the selenium molecule using isotopically pure samples of 78Se and 80Se. They observed two subsystems, with the first being stronger and more developed than the second. The study provides insights into the vibrational levels, predissociation, and potential energy curves of the molecule.
